name: notifme-sdk
description: Unified notification SDK (emails, SMS, pushes, webpushes...) for Node.js
author: Notif.me

scripts.build: yarn run clean && babel src --out-dir lib && yarn run build-dot-flow
scripts.build-dot-flow: find ./src -name '*.js' | while read filepath; do cp $filepath `echo $filepath | sed 's/\/src\//\/lib\//g'`.flow; done
scripts.demo:
notification-catcher & babel-node examples/with-notification-catcher.js && printf '
>>> Please visit http://localhost:1080 <<<

'
scripts.size: echo 'Notif.me build size:' && du -hs lib/ && cost-of-modules --yarn
